item.description:
This is a huge opportunity to meet up with like minded individuals from all around the east coast.
For more details please visit this site: http://endthefedusa.n...
Federal Reserve Bank of Boston
600 Atlantic Ave # 100 Boston, MA 02210(617) 973-3000

This is where we will be gathering on Nov 22, 2009 The official times are 10am - 2pm with speakers speaking at noon.
We will then walk up to Fanueil Hall Market Place for a post rally celebration. It is about a 15 min walk.

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: 11/22 End The Fed rally @ Federal Reserve Bank of Boston 600 Atlantic av. 10am-2
